last_episode_to_air.name: Florence
last_episode_to_air.overview: In Florence, Italy, the final day sees a sculpture lesson with a toga-clad Brendan Sheerin acting as the model. The group then views the city before this tour's winners are crowned at an emotional vote. Last in the series.

name: Coach Trip
overview: The show's format consists of four to seven teams of two undertaking a coach tour principally of continental Europe. The tours have usually lasted 30 or 50 days, with passengers remaining on the tour only until they are ejected by their companions on one day, to be replaced by a new couple the following day. The travellers are accompanied by tour guide Brendan Sheerin, who appears in every episode.

seasons.name: Season 13
seasons.overview: All aboard for another series of Coach Trip.

seasons.name: Season 14
seasons.overview: Another tour begins as 14 fun-loving Brits embark on the trip of a lifetime.

seasons.name: Season 15
seasons.overview: Fourteen tourists set off on a European tour, beginning with a trip to Split in Croatia.

episodes.name: Amsterdam
episodes.overview: In this first episode, the intrepid travellers leave London, heading for Amsterdam, but unfortunately some of the passengers don't hit if off straight away.

episodes.name: Brussels
episodes.overview: The passengers leave Amsterdam and travel to Brussels to sample some of the local chocolate and taste the famous Belgian beer. But will the vote see the departure of the first couple?

episodes.name: German border
episodes.overview: It's another day and another country for the explorers as they cross the border into Germany. Trouble is brewing on the coach as some of the trippers are having problems waking up.

episodes.name: Baden Baden
episodes.overview: It's time for a spot of pampering for the Coach Trip passengers as they arrive in the German spa town of Baden Baden. They get a lesson in making Black Forest Gateaux and relax at a spa

episodes.name: Munchen
episodes.overview: In Munich, the passengers visit the Olympic Tower and get a chance to soak up the sights and sounds of the city.

episodes.name: Salzburg
episodes.overview: The tourists arrive in Salzburg, Austria and take a trip around the salt mines and then re-enact some of the classic movie moments from The Sound of Music.

episodes.name: Linz
episodes.overview: The coach remains in Austria as the trippers visit the city of Linz. Brendan and Chris the driver have a difference of opinion, and everyone takes a lunch cruise down the River Danube

episodes.name: Vienna
episodes.overview: The tourists visit Vienna. After a game of animal charades the group take a trip around the oldest zoo in the world.

episodes.name: Graz
episodes.overview: The Coach Trip is still in Austria and visits Graz. Relations on the coach are fraught as Brendan loses his temper with one of the younger trippers.

episodes.name: Ljubljana
episodes.overview: The coach leaves Austria for a brief visit to Slovenia and the capital Ljubljana.

episodes.name: Venice
episodes.overview: The coach trip arrives in Venice. Max feels at home and longs for love in the romantic city, the rest jump aboard a gondola and Phil has yet more problems with the local food.

episodes.name: Bologna
episodes.overview: The Italian leg of the trip continues with a stop in Bologna. The day doesn't start well as Max and Tom get a bit of a surprise when they check out of the hotel.

episodes.name: Orvieto
episodes.overview: The group travels south to Orvieto in Umbria where they are taught traditional pizza making and taste some local wine, and some new arrivals make a memorable first impression on the coach.

episodes.name: Rome
episodes.overview: The Coach Trip arrives in Rome where they have a busy day of sightseeing, although it is marred by what some trippers consider Sally's attention-seeking.

episodes.name: Florence
episodes.overview: The coach travels to Florence. There's a bad start to the day with some laundry problems which upsets Pasquale, and the tourists embarrass Brendan at an art lesson.

episodes.name: Pisa
episodes.overview: After the previous day's vote the coach atmosphere is at an all-time low as the tour rolls into Pisa where the tourists take some snaps of the famous leaning tower.

episodes.name: Switzerland
episodes.overview: After the shocking events of the vote, Brendan desperately tries to calm the travellers down as they make their way on to Switzerland and a visit to a local chocolate factory.

episodes.name: Turin
episodes.overview: The coach is joined by some new passengers as it makes its way to Turin. The tourists get to visit the Shroud of Turin museum and do a spot of shopping.

episodes.name: Switzerland
episodes.overview: Yet more trouble occurs on the trip as there is a disturbance in the hotel and Brendan decides he must take serious action.

episodes.name: Monaco
episodes.overview: The coach rolls into Monaco, the playground of the rich and famous, where the passengers explore a luxury boat and tactics rear their ugly head when some of them discuss a voting plan.

episodes.name: Arles
episodes.overview: Another day, another city for the European explorers as they arrive in the French city of Arles and the boys try to impress the girls by dressing as gladiators.

episodes.name: Andorra
episodes.overview: A long journey on the coach to Andorra gives the passengers the chance to entertain each other, before everybody strips off at a spa. But tempers flare at voting time.

episodes.name: Barcelona
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in Barcelona for some sightseeing and paella making. Two of the male passengers compete for the affections of coach tripper Lisa and some new arrivals cause a stir.

episodes.name: Zaragoza
episodes.overview: The coach continues travelling through Spain and pulls up in Zaragoza where the coach trippers get a scare at a bull ring, before dancing with some locals at a Spanish concert.

episodes.name: La Rioja
episodes.overview: The passengers roll into their next Spanish stop, La Rioja. The tour sample a little too much wine before moving on to an art gallery, where they're less than impressed with the art.

episodes.name: San Sebastian
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in San Sebastian, where bad weather forces the group indoors. Brendan gets to the bottom of a coach romance, and one of the passengers has a makeover.

episodes.name: Biarritz
episodes.overview: Surf's up on today's episode when the coach arrives in the beach haven of Biarritz, although Gavin thinks he knows more than the experts. The tour then moves on to Bordeaux for some wine.

episodes.name: Poitiers
episodes.overview: Brendan and the coach trippers continue on the French leg of the tour and arrive in Poitiers, where they get to nose around an impressive chateau and monkey about at an animal park.

episodes.name: Paris
episodes.overview: The coach arrives at its final destination, Paris. Romance is in the air for Lisa and Winter, but the taste of snails soon brings everyone back down to earth...

episodes.name: London
episodes.overview: The coach makes its way back home to London, giving everyone a chance to recall the highlights of their extraordinary 30-day European coach adventure.

episodes.name: Madrid
episodes.overview: Starting from Madrid, a new coachload of 14 intrepid travellers head off across Europe in the second series of the travel programme with a difference.

episodes.name: Belgium - Antwerp
episodes.overview: The third series of the travel show with a difference starts in London, with the first port of call in Antwerp. One of the tourists, Deanne, claims she can predict the future from tarot cards. But will she be able to foresee how this adventure turns out?

episodes.name: France - Reims
episodes.overview: The tourists visit Reims and the World War II Surrender Museum, before a merry trip to a Champagne house. One couple are already being singled out at vote time.

episodes.name: Luxembourg - Luxembourg City
episodes.overview: A walking tour of Luxembourg City gets mixed reviews and a pottery class proves popular for all the wrong reasons. The first new couple join the tour.

episodes.name: France - Strasbourg
episodes.overview: The group have an Alsatian cooking class in Strasbourg and visit one of Europe's biggest theme parks. But an unexpected row at voting time spoils the party.

episodes.name: Switzerland - Mount Titlis
episodes.overview: The group head up a snow-covered mountain in Switzerland, and the atmosphere is still frosty after last night's bust-up. Can Graham and Ivy survive another vote?

episodes.name: Switzerland - Lucerne
episodes.overview: The coach has reached Lucerne in Switzerland, and the group upset a local celebrity before upsetting each other at another emotional vote.

episodes.name: Liechtenstein
episodes.overview: Brendan gets annoyed as one of the tourists gets drunk at the Prince of Liechtenstein's private vineyard, plus a flamboyant new couple join the group.

episodes.name: Germany - Munich
episodes.overview: The group go on a rather unusual tour of Munich's Olympic stadium, while the noisy new arrivals get a mixed response from the rest of the tourists.

episodes.name: Austria - Berchtesgaden
episodes.overview: The group cross over into Austria, where one tourist behaves very badly at Hitler's Eagle's Nest. But at vote time it's another couple who are warned about their behaviour.

episodes.name: Austria - Innsbruck
episodes.overview: An Alpine adventure is on the itinerary today as the group learn to yodel and bobsleigh in Innsbruck. Plus, two new couples join the party to shake things up a little.

episodes.name: Italy - Lake Garda
episodes.overview: The coach heads into Italy and the group learn to sail on beautiful Lake Garda. After a dramatic vote the new arrivals suspect they are being targeted by the original Coach Trippers.

episodes.name: Italy - Venice
episodes.overview: The group enjoy a romantic day in Venice: appropriately enough, a love affair is blossoming within the group. But love is not in the air at another tense vote.

episodes.name: Italy - Comacchio
episodes.overview: The coach heads down Italy's Adriatic coast, where a visit to an eel farm is too much for some to stomach. At a dramatic vote the new arrivals and the original Coach Trippers air their grievances about each other.

episodes.name: Italy - Bologna
episodes.overview: The group attempt to learn Italian - some more successfully than others - and then visit a traditional vineyard. There are more new arrivals and surprise departures after an emotional vote.

episodes.name: Italy - Cesenatico
episodes.overview: The coach pulls into the Italian seaside town of Cesenatico, where two of the group reveal more than they should at the beach. Two Coach Trippers have an angry bust-up at lunch.

episodes.name: Italy - Ancona
episodes.overview: The group visit some spectacular limestone caves and welcome two more new tourists before suffering seasickness on a stormy night ferry to Croatia.

episodes.name: Croatia - Makarska
episodes.overview: Still feeling the effects of their rough ferry crossing, the group head to the peaceful Croatian seaside town of Makarska. But the peace is wrecked by a big row at vote time.

episodes.name: Croatia - Dubrovnik
episodes.overview: A walk along the Dubrovnik city walls proves too much for two of the tourists, and then at the vote yesterday's disagreement flares up again - leading to an early exit for one couple.

episodes.name: Montenegro - Bay of Kotor
episodes.overview: Two couples are taken ill and miss the day's trip to Montenegro - leading to a surprise result at vote time.

episodes.name: Croatia - Split
episodes.overview: There is a dramatic early-morning departure before the tour reaches the city of Split, where some local hunks teach the Coach Trippers Croatian watersports - with mixed results.

episodes.name: Croatia - Zadar
episodes.overview: Two new arrivals join the group, as they continue their exploration of Croatia with a tour of the Dalmatian islands on a private boat. But one tourist spoils the fun with some inappropriate behaviour, which causes more friction at vote time.

episodes.name: Croatia - Plitvice Lakes
episodes.overview: The group are given time to relax at Croatia's beautiful Plitvice Lakes National Park. But tensions rise later when the remaining original tourists continue to try to rig the voting.

episodes.name: Croatia - Zagreb
episodes.overview: In the Croatian capital, Zagreb, the group swap the coach for some unusual transportation, with disastrous results. And two new arrivals intend to shake up the voting.

episodes.name: Hungary - Heviz
episodes.overview: Brendan stirs up the group by announcing a dramatic twist at the day's vote, leaving the original tourists fighting for their survival.

episodes.name: Hungary - Budapest
episodes.overview: The coach reaches the Hungarian capital, Budapest, where the group try their hand at making one of the national dishes, goulash. Plus, the newer tourists take control at vote time.

episodes.name: Austria - Vienna
episodes.overview: The coach reaches Vienna and the group enjoy some musical treats. But Brendan has a massive row with two new tourists who don't want to play by his rules.

episodes.name: Czech Republic - Cesky Krumlov
episodes.overview: Brendan leads the group whitewater rafting in the Czech town of Cesky Krumlov before upsetting a local guide on a brewery tour.

episodes.name: Czech Republic - Marienbad
episodes.overview: The group are excited by a visit to the spa town of Marienbad, but the treatments aren't as relaxing as they'd hoped. Later, one tourist surprises the group by revealing a secret past.

episodes.name: Czech Republic - Prague
episodes.overview: The coach reaches its final destination, Prague, where the tour party cause havoc in a puppet museum and on a vintage tram, before choosing their favourite couple in a special final vote.

episodes.name: The Journey Home
episodes.overview: As the 14 tourists who have made it to the end of the line head home to the UK, Brendan looks back on his favourite and funniest moments of the 30-day tour.

episodes.name: Portsmouth, UK
episodes.overview: It's day one, and the new tour party is pretty unimpressed to discover that tour guide Brendan has decided to start their grand tour with a spot of sailing off the coast of Portsmouth.

episodes.name: Normandy. France
episodes.overview: The group arrive in Normandy, France on day two of the new Coach Trip, where they make a moving visit to a World War II museum, and then enjoy an archery lesson.

episodes.name: Le Mans, France
episodes.overview: It's day three, and the coach stops in Le Mans, home of the famous 24 hour motor race. But forget 24 hours, the group barely last 24 minutes before being kicked off the racecourse for dangerous driving.

episodes.name: Paris, France - Day 1
episodes.overview: The party arrive in Paris for some horse riding, and then a can-can lesson, which one couple refuses to take part in.

episodes.name: Paris, France - Day 2
episodes.overview: In Paris, Brendan gets lost walking to the Eiffel Tower. And after a fencing lesson in the afternoon, one pair of the tour party find they've been stabbed in the back at vote time.

episodes.name: Chablis, France
episodes.overview: The coach rolls into Chablis on day six for some adrenaline-fuelled rock-climbing, which the group love, and some fine wine tasting which is less of a success. At the vote one of the original couples get their marching orders.

episodes.name: Dijon, France
episodes.overview: Despite a fun morning touring Dijon, the group are getting bored of France and dreary afternoon making local mustard doesn't help.

episodes.name: Switzerland - Day 1
episodes.overview: A new couple join the party as they head for Switzerland, where one tour member has a nasty fall on the ice. and another has a nasty strop at a medieval castle tour.

episodes.name: Switzerland - Day 2
episodes.overview: It's day nine, and a scheduled trip up a mountain is ruined by bad weather. Later two tourists get really drunk and make fools of themselves at lunch.

episodes.name: Milan, Italy
episodes.overview: The tour visits Milan, where the group pretend to be David Beckham at the San Siro stadium, and then head to the city's cathedral, where Brendan has a row with a local guide.

episodes.name: Lake Garda, Italy
episodes.overview: The coach pulls up on the shores of Lake Garda, picking up two new tourists, who make it clear they plan to break up the existing voting alliance.

episodes.name: Vicenza, Italy
episodes.overview: A fight breaks out on the coach as it descends on Vicenza.

episodes.name: Venice, Italy
episodes.overview: In Venice, the group take gondola lessons and relax at the beach. But who will get the yellow card?

episodes.name: Ljubljana, Slovenia
episodes.overview: En route from Venice to Llubljana, the group go through some spectacular caves and ride a hovercraft.

episodes.name: Maribor, Slovenia
episodes.overview: The group arrive in the Slovenian city of Maribor, where they have fun dancing on a river raft and rope swinging above a valley. Brendan also has his feathers ruffled by a local guide who is more popular than him.

episodes.name: Graz, Austria
episodes.overview: The tourists try milking cows on a farm in Styria, Austria. Brendan enjoys the visit to the local chocolate factory. Later, there is another surprise exit from the trip.

episodes.name: Laz/Zagreb, Croatia
episodes.overview: In Zagreb, Croatia, an edible flower-making class ends in disgrace for three of the boys. A visit to the zoo goes better and two new couples join the trip.

episodes.name: Slavonski Brod, Croatia
episodes.overview: Brendan leads the group on a day of country pursuits in Slavonski Brod, Croatia. A new 'celebrity' couple join the tour, and settle in with the group instantly.

episodes.name: Belgrade, Serbia
episodes.overview: One of the tour party takes a shine to the local guide on a museum visit in Belgrade and also impresses everyone with his incredible water-skiing skills. The four original tourists still on board do their best to manipulate the vote in order to stay in the game.

episodes.name: Ni, Serbia
episodes.overview: In Nis in Serbia the group are joined by a new couple whose relationship raises a few eyebrows. Two of the remaining original tourists get a nasty surprise at vote time.

episodes.name: Devil's Town, Serbia
episodes.overview:
The group heads further east into Serbia, where everyone is underwhelmed by a world heritage site ranked as the 77th wonder of the world. 

Later, at a local spa, Luke and his girlfriend's mum, Trish, are embarrassed when they end up having topless massages in the same room.

episodes.name: Sofia, Bulgaria
episodes.overview: Two new couples join the coach as the group heads into Bulgaria, where they enjoy a pottery class and a traditional bagpipe lesson.

episodes.name: Plovdiv, Bulgaria
episodes.overview: The group are still in Bulgaria, where they learn how to cook local delicacies such as cow's brain. After an afternoon of medieval fighting, the battle continues at the next vote.

episodes.name: Edirne, Turkey
episodes.overview: The tour arrives in Turkey, where they take a trip to a traditional steam bath.

episodes.name: Istanbul, Turkey - Day 1
episodes.overview: The group visit the Blue Mosque and the Grand Bazaar in Istanbul.

episodes.name: Istanbul, Turkey - Day 2
episodes.overview: The group continue their journey around Istanbul, visiting a spice market and taking a boat across the Bosphorus.

episodes.name: Istanbul & Tekirdag, Turkey - Day 3
episodes.overview: The group head along the Turkish coast to Tekirdag, indulging in a golf lesson and olive oil wrestling.

episodes.name: Feres, Greece
episodes.overview: The coach crosses the border into Greece and stops off at the Evros national park, where the group goes bird-watching and gets a painting lesson.

episodes.name: Xanthi, Greece
episodes.overview: The Greek adventure continues in Xanthi as the group enjoy a canoeing trip and a visit to a local mud bath.

episodes.name: Thessaloniki, Greece
episodes.overview: In Thessaloniki the group learn to make cocktails, but later on things get a bit heated when it's time to vote.

episodes.name: Volos, Greece
episodes.overview: The group get lost in Greece, finally arriving in Volos for an afternoon of canyoning.

episodes.name: Delphi, Greece
episodes.overview: The group are joined by two noisy tourists as they travel to the famous oracle at Delphi.

episodes.name: Athens, Greece
episodes.overview: The group arrive in Athens, where they brave a visit to a theme park in the middle of a lightning storm. A huge falling out leads to a shock departure at vote time.

episodes.name: Corinth, Greece
episodes.overview: New arrivals Eileen and Jake are thrown straight in at the deep end with a bungee jump in Corinth.

episodes.name: Nafplion, Greece
episodes.overview: In Nafplion in Greece, Nathan and Romane join the tour and immediately annoy Brendan.

episodes.name: Olympia, Greece
episodes.overview: In the ancient city of Olympia the travellers are almost arrested for taking their shirts off.

episodes.name: Patras, Greece
episodes.overview: In Patras, Greece, the group go for a spin at a go-kart track and make souvlaki before boarding the night ferry bound for southern Italy.

episodes.name: South Italy - Day 1
episodes.overview: After a boozy ferry crossing, the party land in Italy and try their hand at zip wiring.

episodes.name: South Italy - Day 2
episodes.overview: A trip to a paper museum in Amalfi gets a lukewarm response, but the afternoon spent making limoncello proves to be more popular.

episodes.name: Rome, Italy (Hell Itself) - Day 1
episodes.overview: The tour party arrives in Rome. After a session in leather at gladiator school, two of the recent additions to the group get a nasty surprise at the vote.

episodes.name: Rome, Italy (Caserta) - Day 2
episodes.overview: The tour bus arrives in the Italian city of Caserta. Two of the younger tourists drive Brendan mad by mucking about at an olive oil farm. The afternoon is spent at a mozzarella factory, where the smell is too much for most of the tourists.

episodes.name: Naples/Pompeii, Italy
episodes.overview: The group try their hand at making pizzas in Naples. Two of the tourists are rude to a local waiter.

episodes.name: Southwest Italy - Day 1
episodes.overview: The coach rolls into Palermo and the group visit the spooky local catacombs and make the local creamy dessert, cannoli.

episodes.name: Malta/Southwest Italy - Day 2
episodes.overview: In Malta Brendan ditches the coach in favour of a vintage tour bus and the group pay a visit to a honey farm where they meet some fiesty bees.

episodes.name: Southwest Italy - Day 3
episodes.overview: The behaviour of two of the younger members of the party spoils a trip to Mount Etna in Italy.

episodes.name: Tunisia - Day 1
episodes.overview: The coach lands in Africa and the party descend on Tunis for a day at the luxury spa.

episodes.name: Tunisia - Day 2
episodes.overview: The group have a real taste of Tunisia when they prepare a goats' head stew.

episodes.name: Tunisia & Egypt - Day 3
episodes.overview: The tourists spend the morning in the desert near Nefta in Tunisia, trying out quad bikes. They also handle snakes and scorpions at a visit to an oasis - with a sting in the tail for one couple at vote time.

episodes.name: The Sahara Deserts
episodes.overview:
The Sahara desert is the end of the road for the current series, with the group transported by camels to a Bedouin oasis for a final party with a feast and dancing. 

At the final vote, the group chooses their favourite pair of tourists - who receive another coach holiday as a prize!

episodes.name: The Last Day
episodes.overview: A double-episode looking back at the highs and lows of Brendan's longest ever coach trip.

episodes.name: Arrival Day and Day 1 of the trip - Hull
episodes.overview: It was all aboard as the tour bus embarked on another adventure, this time from near Leeds. The first port of call was Kingston upon Hull with a spot of maypole dancing, before heading to Hull's spectacular aquarium. At the end of the day the couples voted and with three votes Yasmin and Neelofer received the first yellow card.

episodes.name: Day 2 - Amsterdam
episodes.overview: On day two of the trip the group arrived in Amsterdam for the second time in the history of the show. After touring the city's canals by pedalo they learned the exotic art of burlesque dancing. At the vote Brendan introduced the new voting rule: the couple who received a yellow card the previous day was immune from a yellow card the following day, meaning Yasmin & Neelofer could not be voted for, but could still cast a vote themselves. The couples voted for the second time and gave Amanda & Nicki their first yellow card with two votes, which put them in emotional danger.

episodes.name: Day 3 - Rural (Netherlands)
episodes.overview: The coach headed for rural Holland on day three for a life drawing class in Vincent van Gogh's  house. The trippers' artistic 'talent' left Brendan crying with laughter. At the vote, with Amanda and Nicki being immune from any votes cast against them, it came to a three-way tie between Timo & Val, Glenn & Becca and Yasmin & Neelofer, all with two votes. The other couples had to agree on who to award a yellow card. They chose to give the yellow card, followed by the red card, to Yasmin & Neelofer meaning they were the first couple to be sent home.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Bremen
episodes.overview: The tourists headed to Bremen. But on arrival a dramatic emergency call was made after Marg fell ill, resulting in an unexpected early departure from the trip for her and Mo. However, the numbers were soon bolstered by some lively new arrivals. There's a sausage-making lesson and a ride around the town on a conference bike. As it was Nick & Mark's first day they could not be voted for but could cast a vote against other couples. The dreaded yellow card fell to Glenn & Becca with three votes.

episodes.name: Day 5 - Hamburg
episodes.overview: In Hamburg, some familiar faces from the previous year, Ray & Glenys, returned to the group. After a visit to a submarine, it was all out conflict between two couples. At vote time as it was Raymond & Glenys' first day of their new tour and as Glenn & Becca received a yellow card the previous day they were both immune from the vote. With four votes, Timo & Val received a yellow card with a vote from every couple except Ray & Glenys and Sam & Charlie. The main reason for receiving so many votes was that they had tried and failed to convince the other couples to vote for fellow couple Amanda & Nicki.

episodes.name: Day 6 - Gothenburg
episodes.overview: The tourists woke on the night ferry as it arrived in Gothenburg. Brendan whisked the party off to the city's famous fish market, where rotten fish was on the menu. At the vote, with Timo & Val immune from any votes, Glenys & Ray received their first yellow card with a vote from all but one of the other couples.

episodes.name: Day 7 - Jnkping
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in Jnkping, Sweden, where Brendan's plans for a synchronised swimming  lesson were dashed as the pool was closed, so the icy local lake beckons instead. Timo & Val were the only people who refused to join in. Afterwards the couples were invited to have a go at basejumping. Due to her age, Margaret in particular gained respect for agreeing to try it. Timo was left embarrassed after ducking out at the last minute, after he was already up the lift and about to jump. Timo & Val refused to do almost every activity of the day and consequently received a vote from every other couple since Mark & Ann received six votes on day 21 of series three, that a clean sweep giving them their second yellow card followed by their red card, meaning they had to walk the plank and go home.

episodes.name: Day 8 - Norrkping
episodes.overview: Amanda & Nikki were almost booted off the coach after being late in the morning, but were let of with a warning as they had timekeeping issues. Amanda lost her precious diamond ring, and it was unknown whether it was in her luggage, as a result of rushing to pack her belongings in the morning after oversleeping. And, in some Swedish woods, the group had a lesson in mind over matter, but the fire-walking  experience left some of the party cold.

episodes.name: Day 9 - Stockholm
episodes.overview: As the tour rolled in to Stockholm  goth rockers - and ex-relations - Chris and Lauren joined the travelers before they visited a music museum. Some of the party enjoy a roof top walk round the city and then the day's sightseeing was forgotten in a shocking moment of real-life drama as the coach crashed into a tunnel after the driver did not observe the prior warning sign displaying the height restrictions.

episodes.name: Day 10 - Nuuksio Park/Rural (Finland)
episodes.overview: After a night ferry crossing, the tour arrived at Nuuksio Park in rural Finland, where the tourists were eaten alive by mosquitoes as they attempted to master local folk dancing. When it came to the vote, the atmosphere amongst the travelers was very good, and so it was time to share the yellow card.

episodes.name: Day 11 - Helsinki
episodes.overview: The coach departed the woods arrived in the Finnish capital of Helsinki, where the tourists tried a spot of ice hockey at the Hartwall Areena  before having a hot and steamy session in a sauna.

episodes.name: Day 12 - Tallinn
episodes.overview: In Tallinn, Estonia, Brendan planned a stag party, which began with the coach being ambushed by Soviet soldiers. Later, the ladies got to grips with a butler  in the buff.

episodes.name: Day 13 - Parnu
episodes.overview: In Parnu, Estonia, Brendan cast his critical eye over some local glass-making. The afternoon was spent trying Estonia's national sport - with mixed results, including a trip to hospital.

episodes.name: Day 14 - Csis
episodes.overview: Moving on to Sigulda in Latvia, the group get stuck into some medieval games, before meeting a cheeky new couple and taking to the skies at a skydiving  centre. The day started with 4 empty spare seats. The coach, Brendan and the passengers arrive boarding into Latvia.

episodes.name: Day 15 - Riga
episodes.overview: With Martin & Margaret and Teresa & Katie gone the day starts with 4 empty spare seats to be occupied. The remaining tourists round off the week in Riga, Latvia, where they are let loose on a summer bobsleigh track, before sampling some of the finest local caviar - which isn't to everyone's tastes.

episodes.name: Day 16 - Siauliai
episodes.overview: In Siauliai, Lithuania, the tourists pay a visit to the spectacular Hill of Crosses, one of the country's major Catholic pilgrimage sites. Later, they party with a local folk group.

episodes.name: Day 17 - Vilnius
episodes.overview: In Vilnius, Lithuania, the group pay a harrowing visit to the KGB museum. And, despite Brendan's attempt to cheer everyone up in the afternoon, the day ends in turmoil, with a shock red card at an emotional vote.

episodes.name: Day 18 - Kaunas
episodes.overview: Day 18, in Kaunas, Lithuania, brings more new arrivals, a disastrous traditional cookery lesson and a spectacularly unsuccessful raft-building session.

episodes.name: Day 19 - Curonian Spit
episodes.overview: Yet more new arrivals climb onboard at Curonian Spit in Lithuania. It's not long before everyone's getting stuck into the locals' traditional work: gutting and smoking fish - which causes plenty of commotion among the tourists. The afternoon is due to be spent blow-carting - except there's no wind - and, at the vote, there's all-out war between two couples.

episodes.name: Day 20 - Klaipeda
episodes.overview: The Lithuanian love-in continues in Klaipeda, as the group meet dolphins and a huge sea lion at the Sea Museum. Later, they scour the beach for Baltic amber.

episodes.name: Day 21 - Malmo
episodes.overview: The tourists arrive in Sweden and drive to Malmo, where they receive a rap lesson from a local pop star.

episodes.name: Day 22 - Copenhagen
episodes.overview: In Copenhagen, the tourists try to see the city by kayak, but Brendan falls out of his vessel, and the major city waterways prove too much for the plucky Brits.

episodes.name: Day 23 - Odense
episodes.overview: In Odense, Denmark, Amanda and Nikki's prayers are answered in the form of hunks Geoff and Jack. On a visit to the Hans Christian Andersen museum, Amanda and Jack flirt heavily.

episodes.name: Day 24 - Arhus
episodes.overview: Glamorous girls Kayley & Helena join the coach in Arhus, Denmark, where the trippers head off to the Sky Tower for a freefall drop which tests their fear of heights. Later in the day new couple Phil & Celia join the group for some wood carving.

episodes.name: Day 25 - Aalborg
episodes.overview: In Aalborg, Denmark the rivalry escalates between new girls Kayleigh and Helena, and Amanda and Nikki, with some impromptu dancing on the coach before the group take part in traditional viking games. Then later on mucking out at a pig farm proves too much for the tourists.

episodes.name: Day 26 - Rural Norway
episodes.overview: The tour party arrives off the ferry in Norway, where the group learn handball and tackle a 1km zip wire across a river.

episodes.name: Day 27 - Oslo
episodes.overview: The coach trundles into Oslo and Brendan takes the tourists for a spot of culture at the Munch museum.

episodes.name: Day 28 - Bergen
episodes.overview: After a bad night's sleep on the night train, the tourists arrive in Bergen, before boarding a boat to tour the stunning fjords, and then going skiing, with predictable results.

episodes.name: Day 29 - Voss
episodes.overview: In Voss, Norway, on the last full day of the current trip, the party goes white water rafting and abseil down sheer cliffs, before voting for their favourite couple.

episodes.name: Day 30 - The Last Day
episodes.overview: It's the journey home and Brendan reminisces about the best and worst of the last 30 days on the road.

episodes.name: Day 1 - Prague
episodes.overview: The celebrity party gets straight on with the fun in Prague. First up is a lesson at the Czech National Ballet. Later they go for a hair-raising ride in old Soviet tanks. Two new arrivals join the coach in the shape of Big Brother's Ben Duncan and ex-Apprentice star Raef Bjayou

episodes.name: Day 2 - Pilzen
episodes.overview: The coach leaves Prague for Pilzen in the west of the Czech Republic. A surprised Brendan finds himself naked in a beer bath with Ingrid Tarrant and Barry Chuckle. And Ricky Groves and Alex Ferns display a lot more of themselves than Bianca Gascoigne and Imogen Thomas bargained for

episodes.name: Day 3 - Regensburg
episodes.overview: The travellers arrive in Regensburg, Germany, where Alex struggles with sausage-making, while Ricky shows off his cooking skills and prepares lunch for everyone. In the afternoon, the group embarks on a river cruise, but Brendan's educational efforts are scuppered by the presence of a keg of beer.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Passau
episodes.overview: The coach reaches the Bavarian town of Passau, where the famous faces enjoy a tour of the cathedral and receive an accordion lesson. They also take a canoe trip down the Danube, where Ben and Raef annoy Brendan by heading off in their own direction.

episodes.name: Day 5 - Linz
episodes.overview: The tourists arrive in Linz, Austria, where they cross water in AquaSpheres, and visit the Museum of the Future, where an experiment fails to find activity in Ben Duncan's brain.

episodes.name: Day 6 - Salzburg
episodes.overview: As the travellers prepare to set off for Salzburg, they are joined by interior designers Colin McAllister and Justin Ryan. Brendan's refereeing skills are put to the test with the little-known Tyrolean sport of six cup, before another two new arrivals, former Dollar heart-throb David Van Day and DJ Tony Blackburn, board the coach.

episodes.name: Day 7 - Innsbruck
episodes.overview: Former football player Rodney Marsh and ex-Bucks Fizz star Cheryl Baker join the tour as it heads for the Austrian Alpine resort of Innsbruck. There, they are given a chance to feed the animals at Europe's highest zoo, before hurtling back down the mountain at a summer bobsleigh track.

episodes.name: Day 8 - Trento
episodes.overview: With the coach being repaired, the party is late leaving for Trento in Italy, and at vote time another celebrity couple get the axe, but they do not go quietly.

episodes.name: Day 9 - Verona
episodes.overview: The famous faces visit Juliet's balcony in Verona, before receiving an opera lesson in the city's Roman amphitheatre, where they are joined by Transylvanian pop duo the Cheeky Girls.

episodes.name: Day 10 - Venice
episodes.overview: The well-known tourists finish their journey in Venice, where they enjoy a creative morning making masks. Brendan causes a stir when he gets mobbed by fans in St Mark's Square and the afternoon is spent relaxing in gondolas before the final vote takes place.

episodes.name: Day 1 - Milan
episodes.overview:
The new tour in the Mediterranean sun starts in Milan the famous place for fashion, and within hours the tourists are making a racket 'singing' opera next to the city's famous cathedral.

At the first vote there are already signs of tension and daggers among this feisty group - Brendan's going to have his work cut out.

episodes.name: Day 2 - Lago Maggiore
episodes.overview:
It's Day 2 of the brand new tour and the group travels to the stunning Lake Maggiore in the foothills of the Alps.

The tourists get the chance to swim at one of the lake's exclusive islands. Two of the lads aren't shy when stripping off for a swim, causing one of the ladies to get very overexcited. But one couple who don't share in the fun find themselves under pressure at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 3 - Saas-Fee and Zermatt
episodes.overview:
The party crosses the Swiss border. But Brendan's planned 'snow day' hits the rocks when because of bad weather they shut all of the Cable Cars and ski area was closed since cable car suspension in Saas-Fee on Day 9 of series 4.

Brendan takes them to a local museum instead, which gets mixed reviews. Later on disaster strikes when a tourist takes a tumble on the mountain and is rushed to hospital.

And at the vote it's all out war between two couples as one pair accuse the other of neglecting and phishisically abusing their family by coming on the trip.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Sierre
episodes.overview:
Brendan's tourists leave the Swiss mountains and head for an underground lake. A lesson in blowing the alpine horn descends into 'Carry On... ' territory.

There appears to be a bit of a north-south divide going on in the group, with the southerners not taking Brendan's tour seriously, and tensions on the rise.

At the vote, one couple gets stung in the neck for constant moaning.

episodes.name: Day 5 - Lake Geneva
episodes.overview:
The first week ends with our tourists wakeboarding on Lake Geneva - with predictably dismal results. Two couples make an early departure, replaced by two striking new arrivals who look sure to shake things up.

Ongoing arguments boil over again at the vote, leading to a red card for one couple.

episodes.name: Day 6 - Lyons
episodes.overview:
The coach rolls Mediterranean country bound into France, where they pick up two young attractive new tourists and a game of boules descends into farce as Brendan's refereeing is called into question.

Later on all sense of decorum is lost at a French language lesson where the smutty behaviour of two of the tourists alienates them from the others.

At the vote the passengers outroar and mummify each-other like lions and egyptians.

episodes.name: Day 7 - Clermont-Ferrand
episodes.overview:
The day begins with a shock departure that upsets the group.

Brendan attempts a cultural morning touring the city's sights, but all the tourists want to do is shop. A lunch of a Paris cuisine snails isn't a great success. And the afternoon is spent at the world's only volcano-themed park before one tourist erupts at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 8 - Brive La Gaillarde
episodes.overview:
The second week begins with the group enjoying a morning's truffle hunting, but Brendan gets increasingly annoyed with the behaviour of the younger tourists.

The afternoon is spent on a relationship bonding exercise at a woodland adventure park that almost ends in divorce for one couple. And two couples have a spat at vote time over make up giving them an automatic red card for instigating a fight.

episodes.name: Day 9 - Bordeaux
episodes.overview:
Brendan takes the group to an exclusive restaurant for some oyster tasting. Later the party is joined by two plucky new tourists before an afternoon of catamaran sailing.

Meanwhile the make up row rumbles on.

episodes.name: Day 10 - Mimizan
episodes.overview:
Brendan is forced to take drastic action against one couple after complaints from the hotel management.

Once on the road a bizarre morning is spent at a medieval eco-museum where the group have a lesson in stilt walking. Miraculously nobody gets hurt, but in the afternoon there is a casualty as one tourist is thrown from a horse after scaring it by screaming.

episodes.name: Day 11 - San Sebastian
episodes.overview:
As the coach rolls Mediterranean country bound into Spain a new couple of outdoor adventurists join the tour.

Brendan tests the group's language skills with a Basque lesson before testing their physical prowess with a game of pelota.

episodes.name: Day 12 - Pamplona
episodes.overview:
The tour visits Pamplona, home of the world-famous bull run, but unfortunately they're a week late, so must settle for making some churros instead.

In an attempt to further Anglo-Spanish relations Brendan organises a game of cricket, but the behaviour of a brand new tourist embarrasses the rest of the group

episodes.name: Day 13 - Bilbao
episodes.overview: In Bilbao there's more Basque-country fun with some rural sports before the group hit the beach for an afternoon's surfing.

episodes.name: Day 14 - Santander
episodes.overview:
The tour moves on to Santander where Brendan organises a golf tournament, and once again his refereeing ability is called into serious question.

One couple are increasingly distant from the rest of the group which proves their downfall at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 15 - Gijon / Seville
episodes.overview:
One of the older tourists pays for overindulging the night before and is filled with horror at the first of the day's excursions - a cider farm.

It gets worse in the afternoon as Brendan takes them on a deep sea fishing trip to catch some fish for the Tapas bar in Seville and loses half the group to sea sickness even though Seville could be a number of miles away from Gijon.

episodes.name: Day 16 - Viveiro
episodes.overview: Members of the group have a chance to rejuvenate themselves at a health spa in Viveiro, Spain, where they are joined by a mischievous new couple. One of the older tourists shows the youngsters how it is done during the afternoon's quad bike racing session, and an original duo find themselves in the firing line at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 17 - A Coruna
episodes.overview: The group arrives in A Coruna, Spain, where Brendan arranges Picasso-inspired Cubist art lesson The afternoon is spent with some Galician folk musicians, and two new passengers join the coach. However, it becomes clear that a clear divide is developing between the original tourists and the newcomers.

episodes.name: Day 18 - Santiago de Compostela
episodes.overview: The tourists arrive in Santiago de Compostela, north-west Spain, to visit one of Christianity's holiest pilgrimage sites, but conflict erupts when one of the newer couples tries to manipulate the voting.

episodes.name: Day 19 - Porto
episodes.overview: Brendan organises a lesson in tripe cooking and port tasting for the group in Porto, Portugal, but the behaviour of one couple annoys the other tourists, with the divide between new and old contestants showing no signs of healing

episodes.name: Day 20 - Aveiro
episodes.overview: In Aveiro, Portugal, Brendan challenges the tourists to make and sell traditional sweet eggs, before they enjoy local folk dancing. However, the sun's effects help hospitalise one of the group, before the votes are cast.

episodes.name: Day 21 - Obidos
episodes.overview: The tourists take part in a seaside yoga lesson before enjoying a medieval adventure in the picturesque town of Obidos, Portugal. One member of the group overdoes it in the heat, and her continued loud behaviour makes her an easy target at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 22 - Lisbon
episodes.overview: Two attractive newcomers cause a stir on the bus, before Brendan provides the tourists with electric buggies and lets them loose on Lisbon. However, they end up getting in trouble without their trusty guide to oversee them, and there is further discord later in the afternoon when an argument erupts over the voting rules.

episodes.name: Day 23 - Evora
episodes.overview: The tourists head to Evora, where they enjoy a treasure hunt on Portugal's largest lake before visiting an ostrich farm. Voting time brings a few surprises for the participants.

episodes.name: Day 24 - Vilamoura
episodes.overview: The tourists spend the morning dolphin watching in the Algarve, before visiting a waterpark. However, there is a shock in store at the end of the day when two previously popular members receive the most votes.

episodes.name: Day 25 - Seville
episodes.overview: In Seville, Spain, the group spends the day flamenco dancing and receiving lessons in bullfighting. Brendan is then forced to hand out a red card, leaving the tourists with a tough decision at vote time

episodes.name: Day 26 - Cadiz
episodes.overview: Brendan gets the tourists to cook his favourite dish, paella, before more cookery-related fun takes place at a bowl-making class

episodes.name: Day 27 - Tarifa
episodes.overview: The tourists take an archery lesson in Tarifa, Spain, that leaves one of their number with a few bruises. Later they compete in a sand sculpture contest on the beach, and Brendan reveals their next destination is Morocco - but the threat of being removed from the coach remains

episodes.name: Day 28 - Tangier
episodes.overview: A new couple joins the participants for the last three days of the trip as the tourists arrive in Tangier, Morocco, where they enjoy the city's souk, its open-air marketplace. Brendan also allows the group to create perfumes - with mixed results

episodes.name: Day 29 - Chefchaouen
episodes.overview: The final day of the tour turns into a disaster for Brendan when he is forced to abandon the planned activities and take the group back to Tangier for a belly dancing lesson and a trip to the funfair, before the winners are crowned at the vote.

episodes.name: Day 30 - The Journey Home
episodes.overview: Brendan recalls his favourite activities and contestants from the past 30 days, as the tourists travel back to Spain to catch their flight home. Last in the series

episodes.name: Epernay
episodes.overview: The coach stops in the Champagne region of France to allow the tourists to visit a vineyard and sample the local produce.

episodes.name: Metz
episodes.overview:
After a night's heavy drinking, one tourist is in no mood for today's task: cooking and eating snails. 

Later, the tourists go kayaking, but spend more time under the water than on it.

episodes.name: Baden-Baden
episodes.overview: The passengers are joined by a preacher and her husband as they celebrate their departure from France and enter Germany. The day's excursions include a visit to a car museum, but some of the travellers lack enthusiasm for the nation's engineering. They also dress formally for an afternoon watching horse racing, but one couple's enjoyment of bright outfits and shouting meets the disapproval of their fellow tourists.

episodes.name: Sudschwarzwald National Park
episodes.overview: Brendan sends two contestants home early as he aims to bring an end to the late-night partying. Stunned by their team leader's actions, the remaining tourists travel into the Black Forest for a day of archery and fun on a lake.

episodes.name: Schaffhausen
episodes.overview: One couple tell Brendan they are not enjoying their holiday anymore, so he tries to keep the rest of the group happy by moving the coach swiftly on to Switzerland. There the tourists take a trip around the Rheine Falls and enjoy an afternoon at a farm, with two new arrivals and some unusual games.

episodes.name: Zurich
episodes.overview: No freebie is left uneaten as as the group heads to a Swiss chocolate factory. In the afternoon the Brits throw themselves into an indoor skydiving lesson.

episodes.name: LIechtenstein
episodes.overview: The Brits demonstrate how not to cook as they attempt to create a local delicacy in a Lichtenstein kitchen. Later, Brendan sends the tourists up into the trees and on a rope course.

episodes.name: Kempten
episodes.overview: The tourists are uncertain which country they have woken up in, and Brendan Sheerin sends them to a pretzel factory in Germany, where some of the travellers make rude snacks. Meanwhile, inappropriate remarks prove costly for one couple at voting time.

episodes.name: Munich
episodes.overview: There are tantrums from some of the tourists, and Brendan organises a party in a brewery.

episodes.name: Garmisch-Partenkirchen
episodes.overview: Its childish giggles all round as the Brits head up a suggestively names mountain in Germany. But the giggles turn to cheers as the group get to tobaggan back down.

episodes.name: Salzburg
episodes.overview: The group try their hand at classical Mozart singing, before attempting a lesson in break dancing.

episodes.name: Wels
episodes.overview: A married couple who are antique dealers join the party on their second day in Austria. The group take part in a cook-off, followed by a chariot race at a local horse racing track.

episodes.name: Vienna
episodes.overview: The coach travelled east to the Austrian capital Vienna where they were introduced to new couple Tina and Monica and then took part in a gold leaf gilding lesson where the group applied gold leaf to the frames of mirrors. Later on, the group went to a fun fair.

episodes.name: Gyor
episodes.overview: The coach heads in to Hungary where Brendan lines up a karate lesson and some wake boarding for the holiday makers.

episodes.name: Budapest
episodes.overview: In Budapest the group experience a nuclear fallout drill at a slightly strange museum. During a trip to a thermal spa in the afternoon Brendan has a close encounter with a masseuse.

episodes.name: Nitra
episodes.overview: The group prepares for a day of fantasy and role play in the old kingdom of Slovakia, picking up two fair maidens waiting for them along the way.

episodes.name: Bratislava
episodes.overview: The group goes white-water rafting and then summer bobsleighing in Bratislava. If that isn't enough tension, later on they must vote for who should leave the tour party next.

episodes.name: Brno
episodes.overview: The coach party is joined by two West Country salsa dancers as it makes its way through the Czech Republic. The Brits get a taste of the high life as they learn to use jumping stilts, before spending an afternoon down a local cave.

episodes.name: Ostrava
episodes.overview: In Ostrava Brendan introduces the group to a castle abseil followed by some grass skiing. Later on one couple's past comments come back to haunt them at vote time.

episodes.name: Bielsko-Biala
episodes.overview: As the coach enters Poland the Brits tour a brewery before Brendan takes his happy travellers for a lesson in local dancing.

episodes.name: Krakow
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in Krakow and the tourists visit the local salt mine before exploring the city on bicycles.

episodes.name: Katowice
episodes.overview: Brendan wants the tourists to get a taste of Polish life, so he leads them straight to the kitchen for a lesson in sausage soup and beetroot salads.

episodes.name: Wroclaw
episodes.overview: It's costume time and Brendan gets his Brits dressed up as gnomes in Wroclaw, Poland, as they hunt for the city's collection of little statues.

episodes.name: Boleslawiec and Dresden
episodes.overview: The tourists spend the morning at a Polish pottery lesson and the afternoon on a riverboat trip in Germany.

episodes.name: Leipzig
episodes.overview: With only a few days of the current tour to go, the last yellow card vote of the trip is due. Paranoia has set in within the group, with nobody wanting to fall at the final hurdle.

episodes.name: Berlin
episodes.overview: In Berlin, the Brits go straight to remnants of the Berlin Wall for a graffiti lesson. The last activity of the trip is cocktail making, where the tourists raise a glass to reaching the end of the road. But who'll receive the toast as the group chooses their winners in the last vote?

episodes.name: Going Home
episodes.overview:
As they pack their bags for home, Brendan and the Brits take a moment to reflect on all the fun they've had over the last six weeks.

Having driven through 10 different countries, and having welcomed over 40 holidaymakers on board, there's been no shortage of hilarity and tantrums on the coach's latest adventure.

episodes.name: Monaco
episodes.overview:
The ten tourists, including Big Brother stars Brian Belo and Spencer Smith, TV presenter Lizzie Cundy, showbiz partners Gary Cockerill and Phil Turner, TV legend Michael Barrymore and former MP Lembit Opik, begin their European travels in Monaco.

The celebs race around the Monaco circuit in a Ferrari and some speedy electric buggies, but are forced to make a pit stop by the local police.

episodes.name: Isola, France
episodes.overview: The celebrities swap the Mediterranean coast for the French Alps, trying snowboarding at the ski resort of Isola 2000, where WAG Lizzie Cundy is the suave ski instructor's favourite pupil.

episodes.name: Cannes, France
episodes.overview:
At Cannes on the Cte d'Azur, the celebrities try their hand at beach volleyball.

After the vote, two new arrivals, horse racing pundit John McCririck and his wife Jenny, join the tour.

episodes.name: Hyres, France
episodes.overview:
Along the French coast at Hyres, the group takes a lesson in sea kayaking before watching big cats at Toulon's mountain-top zoo.

At the vote, a surprise couple picks up the yellow card.

episodes.name: Ajaccio, Corsica
episodes.overview: After an overnight ferry journey to the port of Ajaccio, Corsica, the group heads to the beach for a morning's horse riding, during which one celebrity has a fall and is rushed to hospital.

episodes.name: Corte, Corsica
episodes.overview:
Still in Corsica, the celebrities head to the hills of Corte for an action-packed day of white-water rafting and ravine zip-wiring.

At the vote, one pair is unanimously given a red card.

episodes.name: Livorno & Pisa, Italy
episodes.overview: After a morning's snorkelling at Livorno in Italy, the coach heads to Pisa for a language lesson and the celebrities are joined by comedienne Helen Lederer and actress Sandra Dickinson.

episodes.name: Florence, Italy
episodes.overview:
In Florence, Brendan announces that he'll only be handing out red cards for the rest of the trip.

Comedian Stan Boardman and his daughter, TV presenter Andrea, join the celebrity tourists.

episodes.name: Orvieto, Italy
episodes.overview: At Orvieto, the last newcomers join the coach - X Factor's Wagner and Britain's Got Talent finalists Demetri and Lagi, aka Stavros Flatley - and the celebrities try to milk goats on a farm.

episodes.name: Rome, Italy
episodes.overview:
On the last day, the celebrities learn how to make pizzas and tour the sites of Rome using Brendan's favourite mode of transport - the Segway.

At the final vote, the winners are revealed.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Trondheim
episodes.overview: Coach Trip is back on the road for a special Christmas series - a northerly mission to meet Santa Claus in Lapland.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Hell
episodes.overview: On day two of the Christmas tour, the coach heads to Hell, a chilly Norwegian town where the tourists ride Icelandic ponies in a competitive relay that sees tour guide Brendan disqualified.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Are
episodes.overview:
On the third day of the Christmas trip, the coach heads north through Scandinavia to re in Sweden, where the tourists go zip-wiring in the morning and sample moose meat in the afternoon.

There are fireworks at the vote as one couple feel they have been singled out for criticism.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Ostersund
episodes.overview: The coach reaches Ostersund in Sweden, where the tourists tap into their bloodthirsty side to play Viking games and get crafty making Christmas wreaths.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Sollefte
episodes.overview:
In northern Sweden a new couple join the group, and Brendan arranges a sauna and hot-tub session for the tourists.

In the afternoon there's chaos in the kitchen when the trippers try to make Christmas chocolates, and the knives are out come vote time.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Ornskoldsvik
episodes.overview:
It's the sixth day of the Christmas tour and the coach trip is continuing the festive fun, reaching Ornskoldsvik in the north of Sweden.

The group enjoys a canoeing lesson in the morning and the tourists quite literally hit the ice in the afternoon with a competitive game of ice hockey.

At vote time, it seems Santa's come early as there are positive vibes all round and the coach's favourite couple are awarded a real Christmas treat.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Ume
episodes.overview:
Day 7 and the Christmas Coach Trip adventure continues as the tourists arrive in the Swedish town of Ume. In the morning, the group sample some of Sweden's more adventurous culinary delights.

In the afternoon, they try their hand at blowing Christmas baubles - an activity that would make Santa himself blush. The gloves come off for the vote as one couple are accused of killing the Christmas spirit.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Skellefte
episodes.overview:
It's Day 8 of the Christmas trip and the coach heads further north towards the Arctic Circle to Skellefte in Sweden, where - in true Christmas fashion - the group put on a panto.

In the afternoon, the trippers take to the ice for a competitive game of curling, which leads to two disqualifications, and Brendan oversees a bad-tempered vote that ends in tears.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Lule
episodes.overview:
On Day 9 of the Christmas trip through Scandinavia, the group head to Lule on the coast in northern Sweden, where Brendan takes the tourists abseiling off a sheer rock face in terrible weather conditions.

With tensions in the group starting to show, an afternoon of supposedly calming Tai Chi does little to soothe frayed nerves and tempers soon flare at the vote.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Lapland
episodes.overview:
On Day 10 of the Christmas tour the coach finally arrives in Lapland. But Santa's grotto seems a long way off when the tourists spend the morning white-water rafting in ice-cold water.

In the afternoon, the couples get to grips with each other during a Swedish massage lesson. Tensions rise at the vote, when the group have to decide whether to send one couple home before Christmas.

episodes.name: Christmad Coach Trip - Lapland
episodes.overview:
It's Day 11 on Christmas Coach Trip and the ultimate festive experience finally takes place in Lapland. First there's a visit to Santa's workshop, where the group enrol in Elf training.

In the afternoon, they meet Santa, but one tourist has a serious case of Santa-phobia. Later, at a positive vote, there's an early Christmas present for the winner.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Rovaniemi
episodes.overview:
Day 12 of the Christmas trip and the coach is in the Finnish town of Rovaniemi, from where the group will be making a special journey across the Arctic Circle for the first time.

In the morning, the competition really heats up as the tourists go 10-pin bowling, and an encounter with some naughty trolls results in a festive food fight in the afternoon.

It's an emotional vote as Brendan announces there'll be an instant red card and one of the original members will be heading home.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Arctic Circle
episodes.overview:
The 13th day of the Christmas tour sees the coach inside the Arctic Circle as it heads further north and today there's a birthday boy on board.

Brendan has to get tough when the tourists are underwhelmed by a session of frisbee golf. Then, in the afternoon, everyone gets their hands dirty down a Finnish amethyst mine.

One couple get a shock at the vote when they discover they aren't as popular as they thought.

episodes.name: Christmas Coach Trip - Inari
episodes.overview:
On the 15th and final day of a very special Christmas Coach Trip, the tourists are in the Finnish town of Inari and wake after a night spent in special glass igloos.

In the morning, they go on a trip to a reindeer farm, which takes an interesting turn at lunchtime. The afternoon is full of arts and crafts as they learn how to make felt with the local Sami people.

The final vote sees the group decide who deserves to be crowned the winners of Christmas Coach Trip.

episodes.name: Day 1 - Ljubljana, Slovenia
episodes.overview: The tourists enjoy a clown lesson and an afternoon down on the farm. But who'll pick up the dreaded yellow card at the first vote of the series?

episodes.name: Day 2 - Maribor, Slovenia
episodes.overview: The celebs learn competitive frisbee. But behind the smiles there are already tensions building between Nikki Grahame and the older members of the group.

episodes.name: Day 3 - Zagreb, Croatia
episodes.overview: Brendan takes the celebs to the Croatian capital Zagreb to fight it out with the Olympic judo team. But Nikki boils over at a cookery lesson in the afternoon.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Plitvice National Park, Croatia
episodes.overview: Brendan attempts to return calmness to the tour by taking the celebrities into the Croatian wilderness to get back to nature and learn survival skills. The celebs also learn yoga.

episodes.name: Zadar, Croatia
episodes.overview: It's the end of a tempestuous first week and after two shock departures the celebrities greet two new arrivals in the form of WAGs Jude Cisse and Chantelle Tagoe.

episodes.name: Essex
episodes.overview: A new set of tourists meet in Blackheath, London, and quickly get to know each other over an Essex-style makeover including fake tan, vajazzling and fish pedicures.

episodes.name: Amsterdam
episodes.overview: The coach heads to Amsterdam, and the group try a spot of flower arranging. But the pace picks up in the afternoon when they hit the slopes.

episodes.name: Utrecht
episodes.overview: The coach heads to Utrecht and, after a lesson in the art of flirting, the group try out their best chat-up lines on the locals.

episodes.name: Essen
episodes.overview: The coach travels to Essen where the group get creative by making traditional bread. The afternoon is an adrenaline junkie's dream as the group go indoor sky diving.

episodes.name: Koblenz
episodes.overview: On the group's second day in Germany a visit to a land art installation isn't to everyone's liking. In the afternoon the group enjoy a cheerleading lesson. But the cheer doesn't last long when it comes to a ruthless vote.

episodes.name: Mannheim
episodes.overview: The heat is on at a sausage restaurant in Mannheim when the tourists battle it out to see who can handle the hottest curry sauce. Come afternoon and it's time for a game of baseball.

episodes.name: Stuttgart
episodes.overview: In Stuttgart the group enjoy a spot of beer tasting, before getting on a big bike for a boozy tour of the city. And after lunch there's a wobbly boat race down the river Neckar.

episodes.name: Friedrichshafen
episodes.overview: En route to Friedrichshafen the coach picks up a new couple. Later the group is split for a Segway race - Brendan's favourite! In the afternoon they explore a Zeppelin museum.

episodes.name: Innsbruck
episodes.overview: Austria, and perhaps a lesson in the ancient art of tai chi will put some positivity back into the group - followed by a terrifying bungee jump.

episodes.name: Val Gardena
episodes.overview: It's Day 10 and the coach rolls in to the Italian town Val Gardena, where the tourists have a wood-carving lesson from a flirty Italian before spending the afternoon llama racing.

episodes.name: Lake Garda
episodes.overview: It's the11th day of the trip and there are tears, tantrums and shock exits in the Italian holiday hot spot of Lake Garda.

episodes.name: Padua
episodes.overview: The coach stops in Padua, where the group enjoy a morning of biblical history. They later try their hand at painting frescoes, before an afternoon of pure luxury at a top local spa.

episodes.name: Treviso
episodes.overview: In Treviso in northern Italy the tourists make rabbit pasta before hitting the golf course - and driving and crashing the golf buggies. They later catch a ferry from Venice and enjoy some fine dining at the captain's table.

episodes.name: Adriatic Sea
episodes.overview: The group spend the day sailing the Adriatic with limbo dancing and taking a turn as the ship's cabaret act. But it all ends in disaster...

episodes.name: Preveza
episodes.overview: The tourists land on Greece soil and spend an uncomfortable morning olive picking in the blazing sun. Even an afternoon on the beach fails to lighten the mood.

episodes.name: Arta
episodes.overview: It's Day 16 and the coach is in the Greek town of Arta. The tourists spend the morning fishing, before getting hot and steamy in a dance class.

episodes.name: Dodoni
episodes.overview: The tourists visit the ancient theatre of Dodoni where they perform their own Greek tragedy. Later they head for the hills to compete in a goat-milking competition.

episodes.name: Ioannina
episodes.overview: The coach heads for the Greek mainland and Ioannina, where the group go on a rafting trip. In the afternoon Brendan introduces a new couple at a jewellery workshop - but the biggest shock of the day comes after the vote.

episodes.name: Grevena
episodes.overview: The coach picks up a new couple on route to the Greek town of Grevena, where the gang go truffle hunting. Following this, the tourists try their hand at a spot of painting in a church yard.

episodes.name: Thessaloniki
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in Thessaloniki on the shores of the Aegean Sea. A new couple joins the group for a snorkel race, and cocktail making in the afternoon leaves the tourists a little shaken.

episodes.name: Kavadarci
episodes.overview: It's Day 21 and the coach-trippers pull up in Kavadarci, where they enjoy a traditional Bulgarian dance lesson. Tthings get messy later on when they whip off their shoes for some grape squashing - and one couple's Coach Trip dream is crushed at the vote.

episodes.name: Skopje
episodes.overview: It's a day of surprise confessions and catastrophic kite-flying as the coach arrives in Skopje. The tourists spend a spiritual morning at Mother Teresa's birthplace before a language lesson with the locals.

episodes.name: Kyustendil
episodes.overview: It's Day 23 and the coach crosses the Bulgarian border to arrive in the town of Kyustendil. The group aren't particularly impressed by the local baths, but everyone gets their hands dirty in the afternoon making clay sculptures - and things really get messy at the vote.

episodes.name: Sofia
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in Sofia, the capital of Bulgaria, where the tourists become zoo keepers for the day. Later the group are joined by a new couple for some Zorbing, and emotions run high at the vote.

episodes.name: Plovdiv
episodes.overview: It's the 25th day on the road and the coach is in Plovdiv, Bulgaria. Brendan's planned a sporty day of gymnastics and rowing for the group. But all sportsmanship quickly disappears at the vote.

episodes.name: Haskovo
episodes.overview: It's the 26th day on the road and the coach stops in the ancient Bulgarian city of Haskovo, where a famous chef serves the tourists a dish they find hard to stomach. Later, the group takes to the tracks for a spot of go-karting, and one of the new arrivals is targeted at the vote.

episodes.name: Edirne
episodes.overview: Day 27 and the group disembark in the delightful Turkish city of Edirne, where they enjoy a lesson in the traditional craft of soap moulding. Later, they are left black and blue after a visit to the local baths - and the fight continues at the vote.

episodes.name: Silivri
episodes.overview: It's the penultimate day and the coach-trippers stop in Silivri. The group make a hopeless attempt at belly dancing, and later oil themselves up for some traditional Turkish wrestling. In the final yellow card vote, will the group remain united for the last day of the trip?

episodes.name: Istanbul
episodes.overview: It's the final day and a spectacular end to the trip as the coach pulls up in the colourful city of Istanbul. The group visit one of the city's most impressive spice markets, and fulfil lifelong dreams of swimming with dolphins.

episodes.name: The Journey Home
episodes.overview: It's the long journey home for the coach trippers, and Brendan spends the time reminiscing about the last six weeks on the road; his favourite couples, favourite activities - and those he would rather forget.

episodes.name: Flanders Field
episodes.overview: The first day of the new tour finds the group making a sobering visit to Flanders Field, a World War I memorial site in Belgium, before taking in a round of Belgian beer tasting.

episodes.name: Brussels
episodes.overview: Day two includes some very messy chocolate making before it gets wet and wild with scuba diving at the world's deepest swimming pool.

episodes.name: Luxembourg
episodes.overview: The coach arrives in sleepy Luxembourg, where one tourist gets hands-on with a local pottery maker. Later Brendan is in his element on a Segway tour.

episodes.name: Nancy
episodes.overview:
The group arrive in Nancy, where Brendan's refereeing is called into question at human table football.

Later, one tourist's dream comes true with a zip wire ride. But two other tourists' dreams are shattered at the vote.

episodes.name: Dijon
episodes.overview: The group meet a very eccentric guide at Europe's first kite museum, and some unconventional locals at a blackcurrant museum.

episodes.name: Southern France
episodes.overview: An action packed day on the coach in southern France, with the first new arrivals, a joke that goes too far at a sausage making class, and a policeman who gets carried away at a self-defence class, leaving Brendan nursing a nasty injury.

episodes.name: Chambery
episodes.overview: Brendan is forced into hospital, leaving one of the tourists to take charge of the group. There's mayhem at a dairy farm. And it's up, up and away in some microlites. Then back to earth with a bump at the vote.

episodes.name: Turin
episodes.overview: Brendan returns to introduce the group to the popular Italian sport of hitball, before exploring the delights of ancient Egypt at a world famous museum. Two more new tourists arrive, but how long will they last?

episodes.name: Genoa
episodes.overview: Brendan has a brush with the law before one tourist wins an invite to the pesto world championships and another is crowned champion at the Coach Trip go-karting championships.

episodes.name: Livorno
episodes.overview: There's a double dose of new arrivals as two new couples join the group to enjoy classic Italian fun at a pizza-making class and then a visit to the Vespa museum.

episodes.name: Sardinia
episodes.overview: Two new tourists board the coach in Sardinia. Brendan lets the group loose at a market after an Italian lesson, then they make waves sea kayaking, but who will be in deep water at the vote?

episodes.name: Sardinia (2)
episodes.overview: A tree-top assault course leaves one tourist paralysed with fear, a Sardinian delicacy causes an upset stomach, and there's more upset at the vote.

episodes.name: Nice
episodes.overview: The tourists have a tennis lesson in Nice and play with dolphins at a marine park. But with more waterworks at the vote will someone be waving goodbye to the coach?

episodes.name: Cannes
episodes.overview: The group make their mark in Cannes with a sea-front mime class, Brendan judges a ballroom dance lesson and the tourists learn there's no such thing as a safe vote.

episodes.name: Aix-en-Provence
episodes.overview: The tourists are on top of the world in Aix-en-Provence after a hot air balloon ride. Brendan proves he's an old master at a painting class, and the vote leaves one couple seething.

episodes.name: Montpellier
episodes.overview: Cupid draws back his bow at a violin lesson, but can the tourists make sweet music? And things get messy as Brendan takes the group for a spin on a pottery wheel.

episodes.name: Perpignan
episodes.overview: Brendan dishes out a slimy facial at a snail farm, and one tourist is a hero at a dramatic banana boating ride. There's a surprise departure and things get tense at the vote.

episodes.name: L'Estartit
episodes.overview: Brendan skips down memory lane at the resort where his international tour guiding began. A volleyball game ends uncomfortably for one tourist, and someone storms out of the vote in a huff.

episodes.name: Barcelona
episodes.overview: The group are overwhelmed by the majesty of Gaudi's Sagrada Familia before they make a splash at an iconic Olympic venue. And at the vote, will two more tourists' trips come to an end?

episodes.name: Salou
episodes.overview: After a messy morning gutting fish for lunch, the undesirable sights continue when Brendan takes the group for a pole dancing class. At the vote, one couple is given both barrels.

episodes.name: Valencia
episodes.overview: As the coach arrives in Valencia a new couple rouse the group's curiosity and the competitive juices are flowing in a paella-making class. Brendan takes the delighted tourists for a bungee jump with a difference, before tears flow at the vote.

episodes.name: Benidorm
episodes.overview: In Benidorm, the tourists hit the big top as Brendan takes the group circus-training before an afternoon spent clowning around on jet skis. But there's not a dry eye in the house at an emotional and surprising vote.

episodes.name: Alicante
episodes.overview: A tense group arrive in Alicante, so Brendan calms proceedings with a yoga class. A synchronised swimming lesson provides an eyeful, in more ways than one, and at the vote an indecisive tourist is left in no doubt as to the group's feelings.

episodes.name: Almeria
episodes.overview: Another new couple climb aboard and hit the bullseye at an archery lesson in Almeria, much to the others' dismay. The group also try their hand at traditional rug-making.

episodes.name: Sierra Nevada
episodes.overview: In Sierra Nevada, Spain, Brendan spends the morning talking to a door when one tourist refuses to speak to him. Then the group are shocked while visiting modern-day cave-dwellers at Guadix, before revealing their softer side at a local donkey sanctuary.

episodes.name: Granada
episodes.overview: The group are left surprised by the dancers at a flamenco class, before the alarm is raised after a frightening turn of events at the Alhambra Palace. Brendan's busy day gets no quieter at a feisty vote.

episodes.name: Cordoba
episodes.overview: There's fun and games down on the farm as the group go olive picking before they express themselves at a traditional Spanish folk singing class. But after the singsong there's a dingdong at the vote.

episodes.name: Malaga
episodes.overview: Bad behaviour on the golf course leaves Brendan red-faced, and there are some truly remarkable results when the tourists paint each other at a Picasso art class. It's the last chance for a red card at the vote so who will make it to the final day?

episodes.name: Marbella
episodes.overview: Day twenty-nine and the trip comes to an end in Marbella. The group go full-throttle by racing dune buggies and celebrate by creating some unique concoctions at a cocktail making class. But which couple will be crowned overall winners at the vote?

episodes.name: Journey's End
episodes.overview: As the remaining tourists prepare to make the long journey home, Brendan looks back on his favourite and funniest moments of their six-week trip round Europe.

13.name: Season 13
13.overview: All aboard for another series of Coach Trip.

episodes.name: Scarborough
episodes.overview: It's day one of a brand new tour and first stop is Brendan's backyard and a day in sunny Scarborough. After a morning making fish and chips, the tourists have a ripper of a time at a caricature class, before battle lines are drawn at the first vote.

episodes.name: Rotterdam
episodes.overview: The group have a spring in their step as they go on a bouncy Kangoo tour of Rotterdam, before tasting the local tipple at a Dutch gin museum. But it's the vote that leaves a bitter taste in the tourists' mouth.

episodes.name: Arnhem
episodes.overview: Brendan resorts to cheating when the group are handed a tiling challenge at an open air museum. There's wide-eyed amazement over lunch, before one tourist sees the light at a skateboarding class - in a local church.

episodes.name: Munster
episodes.overview: At a boating lake a weighty issue sees the group make waves with the locals. Revelations abound on the coach and it's feeding, as well as fright time, at the zoo. Brendan's new rules see one couple come a cropper at the vote.

episodes.name: Bielefeld
episodes.overview: The group arrive in Bielefeld and take on the sport of bossaball - volleyball on trampolines - before one tourist's temperature is raised after some close attention at a hammam.

episodes.name: Hannover
episodes.overview: The tourists have their taste buds tickled on day six by some rather unusual and exotic coffee beans, before Brendan drops some shattering news as they arrive to play ice-hockey. Relations remain frosty at the vote.

episodes.name: Magdeburg
episodes.overview: After a morning tobogganing one couple's relationship takes a turn for the worse over lunch. The group attempt to learn the tricks of the trade from an expert at a clown museum, but there's much more for Brendan to juggle with after one tourist storms out of the vote.

episodes.name: Berlin
episodes.overview: Brendan enjoys himself more than most at a cabaret class before a city beer bike tour is interrupted by rain - as well as an urgent toilet stop. But there's no relief for one couple at the vote.

episodes.name: Szczecin
episodes.overview: A morning ding-dong sees one couple take temporary leave of the coach. Bowling produces a shock winner and there's a surprise or two in store as the coach visits a cold war bunker.

episodes.name: Mysliborz
episodes.overview: On the 10th day of their trip the group head to Mysliborz in Poland, but, once they have arrived, experience difficulty both in finding a rural farm and milking goats. The visitors draw attention to themselves during a raft-building competition, and the holiday is over for one couple after the vote.
